generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, including white arrows and yellow lines, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and some vegetation.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings are visible on both sides of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible along the right side of the road, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible above the road, showing green signals.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible above the road, indicating directions or regulations.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in small patches along the sidewalks and road edges.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing dark due to nighttime.
- person: A person is visible on the left side of the road, standing near a traffic light.
- car: A car is visible in the distance, approaching the intersection.
- rider: A rider is visible on the left side of the road, standing near a traffic light.
